descriptionHtml:
description:
This mod adds a very awsome sword that is there in Final Fantasy 7, which is called the Buster Sword. This mod will add two swords, one handed, and two handed. You can create the any Blacksmith forge, or in the skyforge. You will find the two swords in the steel section when you use the the forge. You can also upgrade the sword. And when you upgrade the sword the damage gets more than 100. And sorry that I forgot to tell last time that images are in the file.
Thank you and please do comment you will enjoy :)
By Lilarvind.
Installation:
Just take the files and the esp and file to skyrim data folder in the installation directory and don forget to give at the box in SKYRIM LAUNCHER\\Data Files.
Uninstallation:
Delete the Esp file from the Data Files in Launcher.
author: Lilarvind
